div.p: The 41 CDC ethnicity codes that are grouped under one of the 2 OMB ethnicity category codes.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.238 where concept is-a 2133-7

Exclude these codes as defined in urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.238
CodeDisplay
2135-2Hispanic or LatinoHispanic or Latino
2186-5Not Hispanic or LatinoNote that this term remains in the table for completeness, even though within HL7, the notion of "not otherwise coded" term is deprecated.

description.value: The 41 [CDC ethnicity codes](http://www.cdc.gov/phin/resources/vocabulary/index.html) that are grouped under one of the 2 OMB ethnicity category codes.
